sentences.english: The performance-to-price ratio superelevation, with the platoon "s price is alone to enjoy."
sentences.chinese: 性價比超高，用聯排的價格買到的是獨棟的享受。

sentences.english: The problem with isolated houses, is that they are very inefficient in terms of land use.
sentences.chinese: 獨棟住宅的問題是土地的使用率低。

sentences.english: Five bedrooms and two Hall three Methodist, 272 square meters, the maximum area of single-family Yat Valley.
sentences.chinese: 五房兩廳三衛，272平米，逸翠谷最大面積的獨棟。

sentences.english: Above the retail are lower residential towers and detached condos.
sentences.chinese: 在商業街上方是低層的住宅樓和獨棟公寓。

sentences.english: And the entire residential area of California is nearly complete.
sentences.chinese: 加州區塊的獨棟住房已快建好。

sentences.english: Jim found a condo through a real estate agency.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆通過房地產公司找到一間獨棟公寓。

sentences.english: Apartment buildings always will be more energy-efficient than a free-standing home, Fitzgerald said.
sentences.chinese: 菲茨傑拉德認爲，公寓大樓的能源效益比獨棟屋更高。

definition: Xinshi District of Ürümqi, Xinjiang/Sinshih District of Tainan, Taiwan
Shilin or Shihlin district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Xincheng District of Xi'an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi/Xincheng District of Hohhot City 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4], Inner Mongolia
